text: was a Japanese actor. He was born in Yokohama, Japan. His career began in 1950. His best known roles were in Neon Genesis Evangelion, Hellsing and By the Grace of the Gods. Kiyokawa died of pneumonia on August 17, 2022 in Tokyo, Japan at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:People from Yokohama
title: Motomu Kiyokawa
